>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.XQRMnEeFugGyDUfq]{Steward Officer}

As a full action, you can @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.PiWpd7yZ4sLOkphL#ready-an-action]{ready an action} to attack a foe if it takes any actions other than the following: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.z8FNl9fShmFH8est#change-grips]{change grips} (from two-handed to one-handed), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.PiWpd7yZ4sLOkphL#combat-banter]{combat banter}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.PiWpd7yZ4sLOkphL#drop-an-item]{drop an item}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.z8FNl9fShmFH8est#drop-prone]{drop prone}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#draw-or-sheathe-a-weapon]{sheathe a weapon}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#total-defense]{total defense}; purely mental actions such as a lashuntaâ€™s @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.QmSOsPFazgFH1kKu]{limited telepathy} ability also do not trigger the attack. As part of the full action, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{demoralize} that foe; if you successfully demoralize the foe, you also gain a +1 morale bonus to your attack roll if the readied action is triggered. If one of your allies attacks that foe before the readied action is triggered, you lose your readied action and your initiative count changes to the current initiative count for the remainder of the combat, as if the readied action had been triggered. Your allies can, however, also ready an action to attack your target without causing you to lose your readied action, provided that they choose the same trigger. If they do so and you have successfully demoralized the target, they also gain the +1 morale bonus to their attack rolls.

At 14th level, you can use this ability as a standard action. Alternatively, you can use this ability as a full action, readying a full attack and an attempt to demoralize the target as part of the action.
